scripts.bootstrap: npm run cdk -- --app 'npm run node -- ./lib/app.ts' bootstrap
scripts.deploy: npm run cdk -- deploy --app 'npm run node -- ./lib/app.ts' --require-approval never
scripts.deploy-all: npm run cdk -- deploy --app 'npm run node -- ./lib/app.ts' --require-approval never --all
scripts.diff: npm run cdk -- --app 'npm run node -- ./lib/app.ts' diff
scripts.synth: npm run cdk -- --app 'npm run node -- ./lib/app.ts' synth
